title: Accessing intermediate layers for LSUV init
body_html:
Hi,

I would like to implement LSUV initialization (https://arxiv.org/abs/1511.06422) for PyTorch.
However, with my current knowledge of pytorch it looks like as extremely hard task, because I don`t see any easy way to access intermediate feature map (I looked at relevant discussions at https://discuss.pytorch.org/t/accessing-intermediate-data-in-nn-sequential/637 and https://discuss.pytorch.org/t/how-to-extract-features-of-an-image-from-a-trained-model/119/64 ), which is needed to LSUV init.

Could anyone, please, help me with accessing intermediate features for implementing such initialization?
